snippet: Gabriel Sassoon’s seven children, ages 5 to 16, were remembered at funeral services this afternoon; their mother and one surviving sister are hospitalized.
abstract: Thousands gather at funeral services in Borough Park, Brooklyn, to mourn seven children of Gabriel Sassoon who died in house fire started by faulty hot plate; mother, Gayle Sassoon, and one surviving daughter, Siporah, remain hospitalized in critical condition; tragedy struck family only two years after they had immigrated from Israel.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and KIRK SEMPLE
byline.contributor: Reporting on aftermath of the fire in Brooklyn was contributed by Al Baker, Joseph Berger, Angela Macropoulos, Sharon Otterman, Nate Schweber, John Surico and Alex Vadukul.

lead_paragraph: Gabriel Sassoon’s seven children, ages 5 to 16, were remembered at funeral services this afternoon; their mother and one surviving sister are hospitalized.

headline.main: Thousands Join Brooklyn Father Mourning 7 With ‘Faces of Angels’
headline.print_headline: After Fire, Thousands Join a Father Mourning 7 With ‘Faces of Angels’
